name: FAnimNode_PoseBlendNode
doc:
Evaluates a point in an anim sequence, using a specific time input rather than advancing time internally.
Typically the playback position of the animation for this node will represent something other than time, like jump height.
This node will not trigger any notifies present in the associated sequence.

BlendOption: Type of blending used (Linear, Cubic, etc.)
CustomCurve: If you're using Custom BlendOption, you can specify curve
PoseAsset: The animation sequence asset to evaluate
BlendWeight: Last encountered blendweight for this node
InternalTimeAccumulator: Accumulated time used to reference the asset in this node
